insert into equipment (ser_numb, rom_id, eq_class_id, buy_time, repair_times, update_time, `state`) values (#{serNumb,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{romId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{eqClassId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repairTimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update equipment set ser_numb = #{serNumb,jdbcType=BIGINT}, rom_id = #{romId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, eq_class_id = #{eqClassId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repair_times = #{repairTimes,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, ser_numb, rom_id, eq_class_id, buy_time, repair_times, update_time, `state` from equipment
